title: Matt Bishop: The British GP 'prank' that backfired on Ecclestone and Mosley
summary: Twenty-five years ago, the British GP was the subject of a 'prank' by the powers that be as Bernie Ecclestone and Max Mosley made the BRDC hold the race on Easter Sunday. But the chaos that ensued didn't have the desired effect, asMatt Bishoprecalls

qa_pairs.question: Who were the key figures involved in the British GP 'prank' 25 years ago?
wrong_options: Luca di Montezemolo and Michael Schumacher
